data.title: Harold Lloyd Definitive Collection (Box Set) (DVD) for sale online
data.meta_description: Find many great new & used options and get the best deals for Harold Lloyd Definitive Collection (Box Set) (DVD) at the best online prices at eBay! Free shipping for many products!
data.text:
My review of Harold Lloyd

If you have never seen or heard of Harold Lloyd I suggest you purchase this box set. One of the top 3 early silent film stars(Charlie Chaplin and Buster Keaton being the other two),a genius of creativity for his time. Beautiful scenes if America 100 years+ago sadly now changed forever. Gorgeous women;Mildred Davis(who became Lloyd's wife) and Jobyna Ralston to name the two main featuring actresses. Imo opinion Harold was a creative genius,stuntman,writer and all with the thumb and index finger of his right hand missing he did the most amazing feats of dexterity. The likes of him won't be seen again. Backed by a varying cast o talented performers this is a jewel which will entertain and amuse for hours. Thank you Harold.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: Pre-owned

Brilliant well planned compilation.

Wonderful to have this "essential" collection of the best of Harold Lloyd movies. Great to see him scaling up yet another building in "feet first". Will be looking forward to enjoy them all in the future. Rich treasure grove of "clean" classic comedies from the master.

Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: Pre-owned
